summary: The Vista3D package supplies core utilities for the Vista3D application, enabling window‑based inference on 3D medical volumes, creation of point‑prompt pairs for interactive segmentation, and MONAI‑compatible transforms for preprocessing, label remapping, and post‑processing of model predictions.
business_intent: To accelerate the deployment of AI‑assisted 3D medical image segmentation tools, supporting clinician‑in‑the‑loop workflows and simplifying integration of deep learning models into the Vista3D platform.
